itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 11, 2013
teaser: President Obama's remarks on Syria and a look at Russia's long term investment in the Middle Eastern country. And a former Lehman executive talks about the company's collapse and how his life has changed in the last five years.
description: President Obama's remarks on Syria and a look at Russia's long term investment in the Middle Eastern country. And a former Lehman executive talks about the company's collapse and how his life has changed in the last five years.
byline: David Brancaccio, Janelle Bitker, Rachel Dornhelm, Steve Rosenberg, Bruce Johnson and Gus Faucher
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 11, 2013
